hero.title: About Ordial
hero.subtitle: We are passionate about transforming businesses through the power of AI and data science.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: At Ordial, we believe that every business deserves to leverage the transformative power of artificial intelligence and data science. Our mission is to democratize AI by making it accessible, understandable, and actionable for organizations of all sizes.
mission.description2: We bridge the gap between cutting-edge research and practical business applications, ensuring that our clients not only adopt AI technologies but truly understand and own their AI journey.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do at Ordial.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for excellence in every project, delivering solutions that exceed expectations and drive real business value.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We believe in true partnership with our clients, working together to understand challenges and co-create solutions.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We stay at the forefront of AI and data science, continuously exploring new technologies and methodologies.

team.title: Our Expertise
team.subtitle: Our team brings together decades of experience in AI, machine learning, and data science.

dataScientists.title: Data Scientists

aiEngineers.title: AI Engineers
aiEngineers.description: Full-stack developers specializing in AI model deployment and MLOps.

businessAnalysts.title: Business Analysts
businessAnalysts.description: Strategic thinkers who translate business needs into technical solutions.

info.title: Let's Connect
info.description: We're here to help you unlock the power of AI and data science for your business. Reach out to us and let's discuss how we can work together.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quick answers to common questions about our services and process.

duration.question: How long does a typical AI project take?
duration.answer: Project timelines vary based on complexity, but most projects range from 3-6 months from initial consultation to deployment.

smallBusiness.question: Do you work with small businesses?
smallBusiness.answer: Yes! We work with organizations of all sizes, from startups to enterprise companies. Our solutions are scalable and tailored to your budget.

data.question: What if we don't have much data?
data.answer: We can help you develop a data collection strategy and work with limited datasets using techniques like transfer learning and synthetic data generation.

support.question: Do you provide ongoing support?
support.answer: Absolutely. We offer maintenance, monitoring, and continuous improvement services to ensure your AI solutions remain effective over time.

footer.description: Expert AI, machine learning, and data science consulting services to transform your business with intelligent solutions.
